    public class PasswordManager
extends java.util.Properties
    The PasswordManager encrypts and decrypts passwords.
    Author:
    Stefan Eike (s.eike85@gmail.com)
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • createHashedPassword

        public final java.lang.String createHashedPassword(int clubMemberId,
                                    java.lang.String plainTextPassword)
        Create a hash of the user's password using the hasPasswort() method.
        Parameters:
        clubMemberId - The mitgliedsnummer of the user.
        plainTextPassword - The (not hashed) password
        Returns:
        hashed password

      • hashPassword

        public final java.lang.String hashPassword(java.lang.String plainTextPassword)
        Create a hash of a plain text password. This method is needed for storing the encrypted password in the XML file and to retrieve the hashed password from the XML file.
        Parameters:
        plainTextPassword - plain text password
        Returns:
        hash of the plain text password

      • fetchPassword

        public final java.lang.String fetchPassword(java.lang.String userName)
        Load a hashed password from XML file.
        Parameters:
        userName - user name
        Returns:
        hashed password
